Verses: 1 naam Dhevanudaiya Pillaigalendru Azhaikkappaduvadhinaale Pidhaavaanavar Namakkup Paaraattina Anbu Evvalavu Peridhendru Paarungal; Ulagam Avarai Ariyaadhapadiyinaale Nammaiyum Ariyavillai.

2 piriyamaanavargale, Ippozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Pillaigalaayirukkirom, Ini Evvidhamaayiruppomendru Innum Velippadavillai;aagilum Avar Velippadumpodhu Avar Irukkiravannamaagave Naam Avaraith Dharisippadhinaal, Avarukku Oppaayiruppomendru Arindhirukkirom.
3 avarmel Ippadippatta Nambikkai Vaiththirukkiravanevanum, Avar Suththamullavaraayirukkiradhupola, Thannaiyum Suththigariththukkollugiraan.
4 paavancheygira Evanum Niyaayappiramaanaththai Meerugiraan; Niyaayappiramaanaththai Meerugiradhe Paavam.
5 avar Nammudaiya Paavangalai Sumandhu Theerkka Velippattaarendru Ariveergal; Avaridaththil Paavamillai.
6 avaril Nilaiththirukkira Evanum Paavancheygiradhillai; Paavancheygira Evanum Avaraik Kaanavumillai, Avarai Ariyavumillai
7 pillaigale Neengal Oruvaraalum Vanjikkappataadhirungal; Needhiyai Seygiravan Avar Needhiyullavaraayirukkiradhupolath Thaanum Needhiyullavanaayirukkiraan.
8 paavancheygiravan Pisaasinaalundaayirukkiraan; Enenil Pisaasaanavan Aadhimudhal Paavancheygiraan, Pisaasinudaiya Kiriyaigalai Azhikkumpadikke Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Velippattaar.
9 dhevanaal Pirandha Evanum Paavancheyyaan, Enenil Avarudaiya Viththu Avanukkul Thariththirukkiradhu; Avan Dhevanaal Pirandhapadiyinaal Paavancheyyamaattaan.
10 idhinaale Dhevanudaiya Pillaigal Innaarendrum, Pisaasin Pillaigal Innaarendrum Velippadum; Needhiyaichcheyyaamalum Than Sagodharanil Anbukooraamalum Irukkira Evanum Dhevanaalundaanavanalla.
11 naam Oruvariloruvar Anbukooravendumenbadhe Neengal Aadhimudhal Kelvippatta Viseshamaayirukkiradhu.

12 pollaanganaal Undaayirundhu Than Sagodharanaik Kolaiseydha Kaayeenaippolirukkavendaam; Avan Edhinimiththam Avanaik Kolaiseydhaan? Than Kiriyaigal Pollaadhavaigalum, Than Sagodharanudaiya Kiriyaigal Needhiyullavaigalumaayirundhadhinimiththandhaane.
13 en Sagodharare, Ulagam Ungalaip Pagaiththaal Aachchariyappadaadhirungal.
14 naam Sagodhararidaththil Anbukoorugirapadiyaal, Maranaththaivittu Neengi Jeevanukkutpattirukkiromendru Arindhirukkirom. Sagodharanidaththil Anbukooraadhavan Maranaththil Nilaikondirukkiraan.
15 than Sagodharanaip Pagaikkira Evanum Manushakolaipaadhaganaayirukkiraan; Manusha Kolaipaadhaganevano Avanukkul Niththiyajeevan Nilaiththiraadhu Endru Ariveergal.
16   avar tham udeiya jeevanal namakaaga koduthathinalae anbu innathu endru arinthu irukirom. Naamum sagootharaukaaga jeevanai koduka kadan aaligalaai irukirom.
17 Oruvan ivulaga aasthi udeiyavanaai irunthu, than sagootharanuku kureichel undu endru kandu, than iruthayathei avanuku adeithu kondaal, avanukul Thevan anbu nilei kolugirathe eppadi?
18 En pilleigale, vasanthinaalum naavinaalum alla, kiriyeiyinalum unmeiyinaalum anbu kuura kadavom.
19 Ithinaale naam nammei sathiyathirku uriyavargal endru arinthu, nam udeiya iruthayathei avaruku munbaaga nichaya paduthi kollalaam
20  Nam udeiya iruthayamae nammel kutra vaaligalaaga theerkum aanaal, Thevan nam udeiya iruthayathilum periyavaraai irunthu sagalatheiyum arinthu irukiraar.
21  Piriyam aanavargale, nam udeiya iruthayam nammei kutra vaaligal endru theerkaath irunthaal, naam Thevan idathil thairiyam kondu irunthu.
22  Avar udeiya karpaneigalei naam kai kondu avaruku munbaaga piriyam aanaveigalei seigira padiyinaal naam vaendi kollugirathu ethuvo athei avaraale petru kollugirom.

23 Naam avar udeiya Kumaaran agiya Yesu Kiristhuvin naamethin mael visuvaasamaai irunthu, avar namaku kattalei itta padi oruvaril oruvar anbaai iruka vaendum enbathe avar udeiya karpaneiyaai irukirathu.

24 Avar udeiya kattaleigalei kai kollugiravan avaril nileithu irukiraan, avarum  avanil nileithu irukiraan, avarum avanil nileithu irukiraar. Avar nammil nileithu irukirathei avar namaku thanthu arulina Aaviyinaale arinthu irukirom.
